games.driving

Class FuelTank

  • java.lang.Object
    • games.driving.FuelTank

  • public class FuelTank
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a fuel tank with an answer, to be hit by the player's car in the Driving game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FuelTank(Question question, int ans, int lane, int cue)
      Creates a new FuelTank object with the following parameters, width of 150 pixels and height of 50 pixels

    • Constructor Detail

      • FuelTank

        public FuelTank(Question question,
                int ans,
                int lane,
                int cue)
        Creates a new FuelTank object with the following parameters, width of 150 pixels and height of 50 pixels
        Parameters:
        question - the Question to be answered by this FuelTank's instance of Driving
        ans - the answer of this fuel tank
        lane - the lane (0-3) in which the fuel tank is located
        cue - the order (0-3) in which this fuel tank is approached by the player's car in relation to other fuel tanks

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet p)
        Draws this fuel tank on a PApplet
        Parameters:
        p - the PApplet onto which the fuel tank will be drawn

      • getX

        public float getX()
        Returns:
        the x-coordinate of the fuel tank

      • getLane

        public int getLane()
        Returns:
        the lane in which the fuel tank is located

      • getCue

        public int getCue()
        Returns:
        the fuel tank's cue to appear onscreen

      • move

        public void move(double amount)
        Moves the fuel tank horizontally towards the car (left)
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount to move the fuel tank

      • setWidth

        public void setWidth(float width)
        Sets the width of the fuel tank
        Parameters:
        width - the new width value

      • setHeight

        public void setHeight(float height)
        Sets the height of the fuel tank
        Parameters:
        height - the new height value

      • isPointInside

        public boolean isPointInside(float x)
        Parameters:
        x - the x-value of the line
        Returns:
        true if the line y = x intersects with the fuel tank
